SELECT ROWNUM, CODE, TITLE, AMOUNT, BUY_NUMBER||'/'||GOODS_NUM "COUNT", GOODS_PHOTO_NAME , LEFT_DAY, LEFT_HOUR, LEFT_MINUTE FROM VIEW_BUYPOSTLIST WHERE REGION LIKE '%'||#{user_region}||'%' AND ROWNUM <= 32
SELECT M.CODE "MAIN_CATE_CODE", M.NAME "MAIN_CATE_NAME", S.CODE, S.NAME FROM MAIN_CATE M JOIN SUB_CATE S ON M.CODE = S.MAIN_CATE_CODE WHERE MAIN_CATE_CODE = #{main_cate_code} ORDER BY M.CODE, S.CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM VIEW_BUYPOSTLIST WHERE REGION LIKE '%'||#{user_region}||'%' AND MAIN_CATE_CODE = #{main_cate_code} AND SUB_CATE_CODE LIKE '%'||#{sub_cate_code}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM VIEW_BUYPOSTLIST WHERE REGION LIKE '%'||#{user_region}||'%' AND MAIN_CATE_CODE LIKE '%'||#{main_cate_code}||'%' AND WRITE_DATETIME < SYSDATE - 7

SELECT CODE, TITLE, AMOUNT, COUNT, GOODS_PHOTO_NAME, LEFT_DAY, LEFT_HOUR, LEFT_MINUTE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT CODE, TITLE, AMOUNT, BUY_NUMBER||'/'||GOODS_NUM "COUNT", GOODS_PHOTO_NAME , LEFT_DAY, LEFT_HOUR, LEFT_MINUTE FROM VIEW_BUYPOSTLIST WHERE REGION LIKE '%'||#{user_region}||'%' AND MAIN_CATE_CODE LIKE '%'||#{main_cate_code}||'%' AND WRITE_DATETIME < SYSDATE - 7 ) T WHERE ROWNUM < #{startList} + #{listSize} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startList}
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM VIEW_BUYPOSTLIST WHERE REGION LIKE '%'||#{user_region}||'%' AND MAIN_CATE_CODE LIKE '%'||#{main_cate_code}||'%' AND DEADLINE - SYSDATE < 1

SELECT CODE, TITLE, AMOUNT, COUNT, GOODS_PHOTO_NAME, LEFT_DAY, LEFT_HOUR, LEFT_MINUTE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT CODE, TITLE, AMOUNT, BUY_NUMBER||'/'||GOODS_NUM "COUNT", GOODS_PHOTO_NAME , LEFT_DAY, LEFT_HOUR, LEFT_MINUTE FROM VIEW_BUYPOSTLIST WHERE REGION LIKE '%'||#{user_region}||'%' AND MAIN_CATE_CODE LIKE '%'||#{main_cate_code}||'%' AND DEADLINE - SYSDATE < 1 ORDER BY DEADLINE, WRITE_DATETIME DESC ) T WHERE ROWNUM < #{startList} + #{listSize} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startList}

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM VIEW_BUYPOSTLIST WHERE REGION LIKE '%'||#{user_region}||'%' AND MAIN_CATE_CODE LIKE '%'||#{main_cate_code}||'%' AND (TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchType}||'%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchType}||'%' OR REGION LIKE '%'||#{searchType}||'%' OR SUB_CATE_CODE = (SELECT CODE FROM SUB_CATE WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchType}||'%'))

SELECT CODE, TITLE, AMOUNT, COUNT, GOODS_PHOTO_NAME, LEFT_DAY, LEFT_HOUR, LEFT_MINUTE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT CODE, TITLE, AMOUNT, BUY_NUMBER||'/'||GOODS_NUM "COUNT", GOODS_PHOTO_NAME , LEFT_DAY, LEFT_HOUR, LEFT_MINUTE FROM VIEW_BUYPOSTLIST WHERE REGION LIKE '%'||#{user_region}||'%' AND MAIN_CATE_CODE LIKE '%'||#{main_cate_code}||'%' AND (TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchType}||'%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchType}||'%' OR REGION LIKE '%'||#{searchType}||'%' OR SUB_CATE_CODE = (SELECT CODE FROM SUB_CATE WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchType}||'%')) ORDER BY DEADLINE, WRITE_DATETIME DESC ) T WHERE ROWNUM < #{startList} + #{listSize} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startList}

SELECT MEMBER_CODE , (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER_INFO WHERE MEMBER_CODE = BP.MEMBER_CODE) "NICKNAME" , (SELECT PHOTO_NAME FROM VIEW_PROFILE WHERE MEMBER_CODE = BP.MEMBER_CODE) "PHOTO_NAME" , CODE, TITLE, URL, EXPIRATION_DATETIME, GOODS_PHOTO_NAME , TO_CHAR(CEIL(TOTAL_PRICE/GOODS_NUM), 'FM999,999,999,999') "PRICE" , (SELECT SUM(NVL(BUY_NUMBER, 0)) FROM BUYPOST_PARTICIPANT WHERE BUYPOST_CODE = BP.CODE) "BUY_NUMBER" , GOODS_NUM , TRADE_DATETIME , TRUNC((DEADLINE - SYSDATE) * (24*60*60)/60/60/24) "LEFT_DAY" , TRUNC(MOD((DEADLINE - SYSDATE) * (24*60*60)/60/60, 24)) "LEFT_HOUR" , TRUNC(MOD((DEADLINE - SYSDATE) * (24*60*60)/60, 60)) "LEFT_MINUTE" , LOCATION_X, LOCATION_Y , CONTENT , (SELECT NVL(MAX(NAME), NULL) FROM BUYPOST_PHOTO WHERE BUYPOST_CODE = BP.CODE) "CONTENT_PHOTO_NAME" , (SELECT MAIN_CATE_CODE FROM SUB_CATE WHERE CODE = BP.SUB_CATE_CODE) "MAIN_CATE_CODE", SUB_CATE_CODE , (SELECT M.NAME FROM MAIN_CATE M JOIN SUB_CATE S ON M.CODE = S.MAIN_CATE_CODE WHERE S.CODE = BP.SUB_CATE_CODE) "MAIN_CATE_NAME" , (SELECT NAME FROM SUB_CATE WHERE CODE = BP.SUB_CATE_CODE) "SUB_CATE_NAME" , (SELECT COUNT(*)-1 FROM BUYPOST_PARTICIPANT WHERE BUYPOST_CODE = BP.CODE) "PARTICIPANT_NUM" FROM BUYPOST BP WHERE CODE = #{code}
SELECT P.NICKNAME, P.PHOTO_NAME FROM BUYPOST_PARTICIPANT B JOIN VIEW_PROFILE P ON B.MEMBER_CODE = P.MEMBER_CODE WHERE BUYPOST_CODE = #{code} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(B.CODE, 5)) ASC
SELECT CODE FROM VIEW_REPLYLIST WHERE REPLY_FIX = (SELECT MAX(REPLY_FIX) FROM VIEW_REPLYLIST WHERE BUYPOST_CODE = #{code})

SELECT BUYPOST_CODE, CODE, CONTENT, MEMBER_CODE, REPLY_FIX, NICKNAME, PHOTO_NAME, IS_BLIND FROM VIEW_REPLYLIST WHERE REPLY_FIX = (SELECT MAX(REPLY_FIX) FROM VIEW_REPLYLIST WHERE BUYPOST_CODE = #{code}) UNION ALL SELECT BUYPOST_CODE, CODE, CONTENT, MEMBER_CODE, REPLY_FIX, NICKNAME, PHOTO_NAME, IS_BLIND FROM VIEW_REPLYLIST WHERE BUYPOST_CODE = #{code} AND (NOT REPLY_FIX IN (SELECT MAX(REPLY_FIX) FROM VIEW_REPLYLIST WHERE BUYPOST_CODE = #{code}) OR REPLY_FIX IS NULL)

mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN (MEMBER_CODE = #{member_code}) THEN 'HOST' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUYPOST_PARTICIPANT WHERE BUYPOST_CODE = B.CODE AND MEMBER_CODE = #{member_code}) > 0 THEN 'PARTICIPANT' ELSE 'NOT' END "IS_PARTICIPANT" FROM BUYPOST B WHERE CODE = #{buypost_code}

SELECT TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(AMOUNT, 0)), 'FM999,999,999,999') FROM (
SELECT NVL(C.AMOUNT, 0) "AMOUNT", A.MEMBER_CODE FROM CHARGE C JOIN ACCOUNT A ON C.ACCOUNT_CODE = A.CODE UNION ALL
SELECT NVL(AMOUNT, 0)*-1 "AMOUNT", MEMBER_CODE FROM PAYMENT UNION ALL
SELECT NVL(W.AMOUNT, 0)*-1 "AMOUNT", A.MEMBER_CODE FROM WITHDRAWAL W JOIN ACCOUNT A ON W.ACCOUNT_CODE = A.CODE UNION ALL
SELECT NVL(R.AMOUNT, 0) "AMOUNT", P.MEMBER_CODE FROM REFUND R JOIN PAYMENT P ON R.PAYMENT_CODE = P.CODE UNION ALL
SELECT NVL(CO.AMOUNT, 0) "AMOUNT", B.MEMBER_CODE FROM COMPLETE CO JOIN BUYPOST B ON CO.BUYPOST_CODE = B.CODE ) WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_code}
